title: Major merger and acquisition in the banking sector
challenge: Comprehensive legal support for a merger and acquisition involving two regional banks for an amount of 50 billion FCFA.
solution: Our team coordinated all legal aspects of the transaction: due diligence, negotiation of agreements, obtaining regulatory authorizations, restructuring entities and harmonizing contracts.
result: Successful completion of the transaction in 8 months, creation of a regional banking leader with over 100 branches, and tax optimization generating 2 billion FCFA in savings.

title: Complex family litigation and international succession
challenge: Settlement of an international succession involving assets in Cameroon, France and Switzerland, with heirs in conflict over the division of a 15 billion FCFA estate.
solution: Family mediation, analysis of inheritance rights under the three jurisdictions, negotiation of an amicable agreement and coordination with international lawyers for execution.
result: Amicable agreement signed avoiding years-long litigation, fair division accepted by all heirs, and preservation of family harmony.

title: Criminal defense in an economic fraud case
challenge: Defense of a business leader accused of tax fraud and embezzlement in the amount of 3 billion FCFA, with risk of imprisonment.
solution: Thorough analysis of the case revealing procedural irregularities, demonstration of the client's good faith, negotiation with the prosecutor and convincing pleadings before the court.
result: Total acquittal after 18 months of proceedings, recognition of the absence of fraudulent intent, and restoration of his professional reputation.

title: Social restructuring of a multinational
challenge: Support for a restructuring plan involving 200 employees, with the need to comply with Cameroonian labor law and maintain social dialogue.
solution: Negotiation with employee representatives, development of a generous social plan, training of managers, and individual follow-up of each layoff or redeployment case.
result: Restructuring carried out without social conflict, 80% of employees redeployed or trained, severance pay above legal minimums, and preservation of the company's image.

title: Tax litigation and reassessment
challenge: Challenge of a tax reassessment of 8 billion FCFA following a tax audit covering 3 fiscal years.
solution: Detailed analysis of the reassessment grounds, identification of administration errors, negotiation with tax authorities and litigation for non-negotiable points.
result: Reduction of the reassessment to 2 billion FCFA (75% savings), implementation of a favorable payment schedule, and securing of future tax practices.

title: International commercial arbitration
challenge: Contractual dispute with a foreign partner concerning a 20 billion FCFA construction project, with ICC arbitration clause.
solution: Representation of the client before the arbitral tribunal, preparation of a strong technical and legal case, examination of expert witnesses, and convincing final pleadings.
result: Arbitral award favorable to our client for 12 billion FCFA, enforcement of the award in 3 countries, and preservation of the commercial relationship.
